pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - SunlightGarden Resort DeviceDash HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact SunlightGarden Hotel Privacy Policy This document delineates SunlightGarden Hotel's protocols for the acquisition, utilization, dissemination, and safeguarding of personal data. Data Collection We may amass personal information, such as nomenclature, contact particulars, financial details, and booking preferences, during the course of your interactions with our establishment, including reservations, accommodations, subscription to our newsletter, and website or mobile application usage. Data Utilization Personal data is employed for the expeditious processing of reservations and bookings, the provision of hospitality services, the facilitation of communication regarding your sojourn and promotional offers, the refinement of our offerings and guest experiences, and compliance with legal mandates. Data Sharing We may divulge personal information to vetted third-party entities instrumental in our operational efficacy, including payment processors, reservation systems, and marketing collaborators. These entities are obligated to maintain data security and adherence to relevant regulations. Data Security We implement robust security measures to protect personal information from unauthorized access, utilization, disclosure, modification, or destruction. Individual Rights You retain the prerogative to access, rectify, or expunge your personal data. Additionally, you may opt out of marketing communications.
